meanings.sent1: She always gives uncritical praise to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The uncritical movie review only focused on the positive aspects.
meanings.sent3: His uncritical acceptance of everything he hears can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her uncritical trust in strangers is like walking blindfolded through a maze.
meanings.sent5: The uncritical approach to problem-solving often leads to oversights.

meanings.definition: Not inclined or able to judge, especially by the application of critical standards.
meanings.sent1: He has an uncritical mind that accepts everything without question.
meanings.sent2: The uncritical student simply regurgitated the information without analyzing it.
meanings.sent3: Their uncritical belief in superstitions can be quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Living an uncritical life is like floating down a river without a paddle.
meanings.sent5: An uncritical attitude towards important decisions can have serious consequences.
